item.title: Dummy's why have they stoped working?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

case 823: if (actionTimer == 5) { sendMessage("You punch the dummy. What are you a boxer?."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;

Replace mine with yours and try that.

i loged onto my server and sme1 pointed out my dummies didnt work :S and im not sure what is causing this any ideas?

i checked my case 823 and it looks fine to me

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the doll."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((8000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((8000*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 1; } break;

i cant figure it out can any1 help me plz?
